abstract: Police security drill at Strathmore University in Nairobi, Kenya, leads to death of staff member after it is mistaken for terrorist attack; 37 people are injured.
lead_paragraph: Video images showed terrified students and staff members standing on window ledges during the police training exercise at Strathmore University.

headline.main: Kenya: One Dies and Dozens Are Hurt as Campus Drill Is Mistaken for Attack
headline.print_headline: Kenya: One Dies and Dozens Are Hurt as Campus Drill Is Mistaken for Attack

snippet: Video images showed terrified students and staff members standing on window ledges during the police training exercise at Strathmore University.
